MajorClaims.Text: being a citizen involves in a number of duties, other than paying taxes

Claims.Text: People in society must do more than paying taxes to contribute to their society
they have fulfilled their duty as a citizen
individuals of a country are responsible for many other things apart from paying tax

Premises.Text: If people are paying taxes, that means they are taking part in the development of their country as well as the country's economy
Taxes are the income for every country in the world and they are extremely important for developing countries
the crime rate is reduced and society becomes a peaceful place, so the country will develop at a rapid pace
in order to develop a country, citizens must obey laws, which were imposed by the government
being a citizen in society should protect the country's culture and history
people should have knowledge about their own culture and history by studying at school with full concentration or reading them from books
a person has to unite with other people in the community so as to develop their nation
if people in society have a strong bond with each other, society will become a peaceful place, where people are helping and sharing to each other
